biotools.summary: An approach for building a cellular network based on physical cell interaction and single-cell mRNA sequencing (for cell type identification). It can be used to discover new preferential cellular interactions without prior knowledge of component cell types.

bioschemas.name: ProximID
bioschemas.summary: An approach for building a cellular network based on physical cell interaction and single-cell mRNA sequencing (for cell type identification). It can be used to discover new preferential cellular interactions without prior knowledge of component cell types.
